mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(P.PAY_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') PAY_DATE, B.BABY_NO, B.BABY_NAME, R.RESV_NO, T.PARENT_NO, D.DIAG_NO, P.PAY_PRICE, S.DIS_NAME FROM PAYMENT P , BABY B, RESERVATION R ,PARENT T, DIAGNOSIS D, DISEASE S WHERE P.RESV_NO = R.RESV_NO AND B.BABY_NO = R.BABY_NO AND T.PARENT_NO = B.BABY_NO AND R.RESV_NO = D.RESV_NO AND D.DIS_CODE = S.DIS_CODE AND T.PARENT_NO = #{parent_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE PAYMENT SET PAY_METHOD = 'A', PAY_ACCOUNT =#{pay_account}, PAY_BANK = #{pay_bank}, PAY_STATE = 'W' WHERE RESV_NO = #{resv_no}
